ingredients: 1 and 1/2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme (or 2 teaspoons dried thyme)
1/4 cup coarsely chopped parsley, plus extra to garnish
Neck, back, wing tips, heart, and liver of the duck (*see footnote 1)
1 cup homemade poultry stock (or boxed chicken stock)
Salt and black pepper to taste
Salt and black pepper to taste
